title: Qalat al-Bahrain
description: An ancient settlement with evidence from occupation stretching from 2300 BC to the sixteenth century AD that was at one time the capital of the Dilmun civilization. Qalâ€™at al-Bahrain was listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2005.
